name: Codesnippets
description: Doing a little coding? Forgot if it was += or =+? Come in and grab a quick codesnippet! This site offers you an listing of code snippets categorized by both language and purpose. Feel like it's missing something? Add it!

name: CV/Portfolio site
description: My previous portfolio site. First real touch at making a website with React. Designed to be as responsible as possible. Includes an info section for: 'Header info', 'Education', 'Skills and details', 'Socials', 'Contact'.

name: CV/Portfolio site V2
description: Current portfolio site. A little more playful and creative, a simplified approach. Optimized for mobile and desktop usage. Weirdly fast, gets all 100's on lighthouse test (if google fonts doesn't slow down).

name: Weather app
description: A simple weather application. Fetches data from an API and displays them. Includes an umlauts filter, so that äåö work properly. Currently only works for finnish towns.

name: Post-stamps app
description: Simple display of React pagination, routes and id's. Loads data of post stamps from a .JSON file, and displays them. Each page consists of 20 stamps, along with their simplified information. Clicking on any stamp opens up their details in a new display.
